articles.description: We don't have any official details yet, but Apple's new iPhone could be coming in September for a rumored virtual event. Here's all the iPhone 13 release date buzz we've heard so far.
articles.content:
The iPhone 13, shown in this render, could be arriving in September. 
EverythingApplePro
Apple's iPhone 12 is approaching one year old, and its successor, said to be called the iPhone 13, could be … [+3341 chars]
